@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Aura]{Aura} 10 feet

A creature entering the aura or starting its turn in the aura must succeed at a Fortitude save or become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Sickened]{Sickened 1} (plus @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Slowed]{Slowed 1} as long as it's sickened on a critical failure).

While within the aura, the creature takes a -2 circumstance penalty to saves against disease and to recover from the sickened condition. A creature that succeeds at its save is temporarily immune for 1 minute.

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.Effect: Ghast Stench]{Effect: Ghast Stench}
